title: voice leading of secondary leading tones

content.description: The following question is based on the excerpt below.
content.question: Which of the following compositional devices best describes the secondary leading tone harmonies in this example?

choices.label: They all omit the fifth of the chord
They all use arpeggiation in the bass
They all use voice exchange between the soprano and bass

content.answer: They all use arpeggiation in the bass
